EmailTemplate.subject: Kansas City Executive Networking Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
In my more than 18 years working with enterprise IT companies, I have had the privilege of watching IT go through waves of transformation from a birds-eye view. All previous waves pale in comparison to that which we observe today.
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reinvent their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – mistakes are costly. This is exacerbated once customers get to the cloud and need to manage complexities across cloud and on-premises simultaneously.
I cordially invite you to join myself and a dozen of your fellow IT leaders in Kansas City on September 28th at Adam's Mark Hotel and Conference Center for an Executive Networking Event <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-kansas-city/]]> from 4:00 p.m. until 6:00 p.m. followed by the Tigers vs. Royals game at Kauffman Stadium. We will discuss this unprecedented shift our industry currently faces and how we as the stewards of our generation can lead the innovation charge. It is my goal and hope that this networking opportunity will be intellectually stimulating and beneficial for all.
I look forward to meeting you, and participating in an engaging conversation. As space is limited, I do ask that you please register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-kansas-city/]]> as soon as possible.
Yours sincerely, Danny
Danny Luong RVP - Enterprise Central Turbonomic, Inc.
